Description: A consummate English socialite, scientician, and investigator. The Inestimable Lady Shaina Setrov has an eye for details and a razor sharp wit that few criminals can match.

Tony Lourque was the recipient of a personal commodation from the mayor for his detective work (before a hasty early retirement for excessive use of force). He's got two ways of solving most of life's problems - a sharp left and a hard right.

Mark McLee, formerly Detective Mark McLee, was riding a golden escalator to the heights of the city police thanks to his well connected father... before his carnal weaknesses caught up to him. The man loves love!
Belying her high society background, Gina Perner passed through New Haven's best charm schools sharpened, rather than smoothed. Now she takes that finely honed edge to righting injustice.
